column1: #Text=Korra says : " Eska , Desna , listen to me .
#Text=If you let me out now , I can still stop him from destroying everything .
#Text=Once he fuses with Vaatu , no one will be safe .
#Text=Desna , he wo n't be your father anymore .
#Text=" Desna says : " You do n't know what you 're talking about !
#Text=Our father is the wisest man in the world .
#Text=If he says what he is doing is right , I believe him .
